name: Trolling Dare
description:
Made in 48 hours at Seville (Spain) on-site Ludum Dare gathering.

  • Paltian
  • Lucas González
  • Angie Rodriguez
  • Iván Cerezo

This is our humble tribute to @sergiodeprado, the organizer of #FamiliarGameJam, which trolls our computers in every game jam

#LudumDare #LudumDare38 #LDJAM38

#familiarforever
